definition: perfect (idiom); perfection/the best of all possible worlds/as good as it gets
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]

sentences.english: The academic society decompresses the life not impossible acme of perfection for oneself, all then people's desires.
sentences.chinese: 學會給自己解壓人生不可能盡善盡美，皆遂人意。

sentences.english: Li Shimin regarded Wang's calligraphy work as perfect.
sentences.chinese: 李世民對王羲之書法認爲已經達到了“盡善盡美”。

sentences.english: Shah Jehan wanted his wife's tomb to be perfect.
sentences.chinese: 沙哲汗要把他愛妃的陵墓修得盡善盡美。

sentences.english: A static portal cannot accomplish the perfect arrangement for every user.
sentences.chinese: 靜態門戶不能爲每個用戶都實現盡善盡美的安排。

sentences.english: But it's just too complicated and too -it's impossible to make it work perfectly.
sentences.chinese: 但這非常困難，非常複雜，而且不可能盡善盡美。

sentences.english: "Pursuit of excellence, Dedication to really good" is my social service purposes.
sentences.chinese: “追求盡善盡美，奉獻至真至誠”是我社的服務宗旨。

sentences.english: Q. Tell me about your as-good-as-it-gets moment in business.
sentences.chinese: 告訴我關於你在商業中那些“盡善盡美”的時刻。

sentences.english: I can warn you about sins, but I cannot make you moral.
sentences.chinese: 我能告誡你勿以惡小而爲之，但不能強迫你盡善盡美。

sentences.english: Q. What do you remember as your as-good-as-it-gets moment in business?
sentences.chinese: 你記得自己在商業中“盡善盡美”的時刻嗎？

sentences.english: We don't expect candidates to be paragons of virtue.
sentences.chinese: 我們不指望候選人在道德上盡善盡美。

sentences.english: As He is most perfect, He must have all perfections.
sentences.chinese: 因爲它是最完美的，所以它必須盡善盡美。

sentences.english: Souma san: Not to pursue perfection unnecessarily.
Then you will be able to discern the will of God, and to know what is good, acceptable, and perfect.
sentences.chinese: 蓋惟如此，方能體驗天主盡善盡美之聖意耳。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is said that Sun Bin's tactics reached the peak of excellence.
sentences.chinese: 所以說，孫臏的戰術已經達到了盡善盡美的程度。

definition: not one thread loose (idiom); strictly according to the rules/meticulous/not one hair out of place
making an all-out effort (idiom); to try one's heart out/to do one's utmost
lit. what the heart wishes, the hand accomplishes (idiom) skilled at the job/entirely in one's element/going smoothly and easily
to experience/to observe
to understand/to comprehend/to grasp
to spare no effort (idiom); to do one's utmost
simple and unadorned/plain/(of land) level/even
prattle/idle chit-chat
to have one's feet firmly planted on the ground (idiom); realistic without flights of fancy/steady and serious character
to arrange
peak/pinnacle/ultimate
indeed/true! (I agree with you)
rare and precious/valuable/remarkable
fine/meticulous/careful
many/diverse
excellent in every respect/flawless
